Message.message: Hello, what is the update on case file 31/10/2011/1592?
What enquiry is being held on the culprit, Saurabh Jaiswal?
Sir, the case is under trial at this moment and the next hearing is on 31/10/23.
We have investigated the case properly and we are still looking for any new information about the case.
Okay, thanks for the info.
Which officer of your department is allocated the Jhumri region in Bihar?
Mr. Ankit Kumar is situated as the SI in the Jhumri region.
What are his connections with the local informants in that region?
Sir, he has an active informant network in the region.
What about his informant network in nearby regions?
According to my information, he also has contacts with the informants in nearby regions. You may contact him for in-depth details.
Okay, just give me his contact details.
Yes sir, his mobile number is 9834210234. He resides in the police quarters in Jhumri.
Will you need anything else?
No, that would be enough. Thank you.
How many victims are there in the recent train crash incident in Odisha?
And what is the number of people who died and who were seriously injured?
There were a total of 448 victims in the accident.
34 people have died, and 124 are seriously injured and currently undergoing treatment.
Okay.
What is the monthly crime report in your division?
Sir, there have been a total of 43 FIRs filed in my division, and the crime rate stands at 9.2% less than the previous month.
How many missing people were reported last month?
And what is the number of kidnappings that took place?
Sir, the number of missing people is 6, and 11 kidnappings have been reported.
Has there been any case of a boy under 10 years going missing or being kidnapped?
Yes sir, there was a boy named Rahul Subramaniam, who reportedly went missing on 21st October.
Okay, I will get back to you if more information is required on the case.
Sure sir.

Name: Securities and Exchange Board of India

Message.message: There was a recent protest in your area, in front of the SEBI office.
The protest took a violent turn, and there were stones pelted at the employees.
What actions have you taken for this?
Sir, we have launched an investigation into this. We have formulated a team that is specially handling this case.
We have already taken two people into custody who were part of the group that started throwing stones. We will soon have a complete report of the above forwarded to you.
Yes, please do it as soon as possible.
Sure sir.
